case.name: Ice Blood
case.description: When getting a bad hand in later stages, Mei sometimes shields herself in a block of ice.

markers.marker: Mei mentions a few times that she's worked in the Antarctic.
Mei, a Chinese climatologist, denies that climate change is a Chinese lie.
Mei makes a pun on Dawn's name when Dawn removes something 'light'.
When threatened, the female of the species must briefly hibernate.
Mei gets topless with Florina.
Mei asks Leela about Fry from Futurama being cryonically frozen, as Mei was also in cryofreeze.
After asking Leela about Fry, Mei gets sad thinking about her own backstory.
Mei correctly identifies Mettaton as an "omnic", which is a self-aware robot.
Mei wants to know more about Nami changing the climate.
Mei meets a kindred spirit who can control the weather.
Mei gets technical about Nami's Clima-Tact.
Mei was in cryofreeze for nine years. Hence, she's technically not had any sexual activity in nearly a decade.
Mei is single and available.
Mei acknowledges that Samus can travel beyond Earth.
Mei thick coat is for cold weather. She occasionally remarks that she is overdressed.
Meeting Samus gives Mei the idea of getting a bounty hunter to capture Reaper.
If Revy is the first one to strip, Mei hasn't yet experienced Revy's behaviour and therefor mistakenly suggests that it's nice to meet her.
Mei accuses Revy of being toxic.
Mei's thick coat hides her curves, unlike Samus's bodysuit.
Samus reminds Mei of D.Va, so she asks if she too can call a mech suit on command.

Mei frequently drops in random Mandarin into her speech, as per her Overwatch representation. Her penalty stage is entirely in Mandarin. Note that this marker is not set on her Chinese swap_cards line, as this will be seen within the first few rounds of the game.
Because Raven has a hood and is brooding, Mei worries that there might be a connection to Reaper.
Mei's signature move is to freeze opponents are short range, completely immobilizing them.
